sentences.sContent: Moreover, our culture and the media convince us that unless we hold on to our youth at all costs, we will face terrible losses.
sentences.sContent_eng: Moreover, our culture and the media convince us that unless we hold on to our youth at all costs, we will face terrible losses.
sentences.sCn: 而且，这个时代的文化氛围和媒体让我们相信，我们必须要以任何代价让青春永驻，不然我们将失去很多。

synos.tran: 无论如何，不惜任何代价

trans.tranCn: 不管多大代价，无论如何
